definition: dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: Now you need to explicitly run the action from the context menu.
sentences.chinese: 現在你需要在上下文菜單裏明確地執行這一指令。

sentences.english: Fixed not being able to escape from map editor menus after applying options.
sentences.chinese: 固定不能夠逃脫地圖編輯器菜單後應用選項。

sentences.english: The prices printed in menus were cheap.
sentences.chinese: 價格在菜單中印刷是廉宜的。

sentences.english: Figure 3. A sample customized menu of favorite commands.
sentences.chinese: 圖形⒊一個定製喜愛命令的菜單樣品。

sentences.english: I ordered the best wine on the menu, regardless of price or taste.
sentences.chinese: 我叫了菜單上最好的甜酒，不管價錢多少，味道好壞。

sentences.english: Freshness and quality are the mantras of these menus.
sentences.chinese: 鮮度和質量是這些菜單的咒語。

sentences.english: The waitress shows you to your table and gives you each a menu.
sentences.chinese: 女侍應便帶你們到一張餐枱，並給你們每人一份菜單。

sentences.english: The default menu item for a menu is boldfaced.
sentences.chinese: 菜單的默認菜單項爲粗體。

sentences.english: The default menu item for a menu is boldfaced.
sentences.chinese: 菜單的默認菜單項爲粗體。

sentences.english: It has good judge of the user. The article is describe main menu a…
sentences.chinese: 本文敘述了計費系統的主菜單及有關內容。

sentences.english: A: Here’s the menu for specialty, sir.
She says fresh pollock is definitely off her restaurant’s menu.
sentences.chinese: 她說，新鮮鱈魚已經從她的餐館菜單裏刪掉了。

sentences.english: You can access by just push the sharp button right here on the main menu.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通過點擊這個在主菜單上尖形按鈕。

sentences.english: The multi-language Babylon dictionary has been inserted on the translation pages at the bottom of the side menu.
sentences.chinese: 網頁底部的菜單已經裝入多語種巴比倫字典。

sentences.english: Another new option from the menu is for binding resource configuration.
sentences.chinese: 菜單中的另一個新選項用於綁定資源配置。

sentences.english: Click to add a custom menu or submenu.
sentences.chinese: 單擊此處可添加自定義菜單或子菜單。

definition: take-out (fast food)/(outer part of) tire/as well/besides/into the bargain/outer zone
(at a restaurant) to order a meal/(of a waiter) to take an order
convenient/handy/easy/bento (a meal in a partitioned box)/lunchbox
to order à la carte/single point (of measurement, mounting etc)
